TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TableLayoutSettings extends System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class TableLayoutSettings Inherits LayoutSettings Implements ISerializable
public ref class TableLayoutSettings sealed : System::Windows::Forms::LayoutSettings, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type TableLayoutSettings = class inherit LayoutSettings interface ISerializable

summary.span: 收集與資料表配置相關的特性。

span.span: Collects the characteristics associated with table layouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別收集和管理相關聯資料表的版面配置方式的特性。The class collects and manages the characteristics associated with the table layout scheme. 這個類別會在內部使用和類別，以及資料表版面配置引擎。This class is used internally by the and classes, as well as the table layout engine. 類別可由版面配置引擎來判斷如何配置容器的子控制項。The class is used by the layout engine to determine how to lay out the container's child controls. 類別會管理下列資訊：The class manages the following information: - 正在使用。The being used. - 資料行和版面配置中的資料列的數目上限。The maximum number of columns and rows in the layout. - 使用包含資料行和資料列樣式的集合。The collection of styles used for the contained columns and rows. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化物件控制項。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 實作自訂的 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/CS/GridStrip.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/VB/GridStrip.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料表配置中所允許的資料行數的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.

value.span: 資料表配置中所允許的資料行數的最大值。

span.span: The maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性不會配置與資料行或任何支援的記憶體。Setting the property does not allocate the columns or any backing memory. 建立資料行時，就會發生這項配置。This allocation occurs when the columns are created. 設定這個屬性會導致資料表進行另一個配置作業。Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化物件控制項。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 實作自訂的 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/CS/GridStrip.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/VB/GridStrip.vb#2)]

span.span: The property value is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnStyles As TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection

summary.span: 取得用來判斷資料表配置資料行的外觀及操作的樣式集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of styles used to determine the look and feel of the table layout columns.

value.span: ，包含配置資料表的資料行樣式。

span.span: A that contains the column styles for the layout table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取特定資料行的樣式屬性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific columns. 順序中的樣式符合版面配置表格中的對應資料行的順序。The order of the styles in a matches the order of the corresponding columns in the layout table.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle GrowStyle { System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示當佔用所有現有的儲存格時，應該要如何擴充資料表配置來容納新的儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the table layout should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何版面配置引擎應該將新的儲存格加入完整的資料表。The property determines how the layout engine should add a new cell to a full table. 這個屬性可以設定為來表示應該加入資料列，來表示應該加入資料行，或不允許擴充。This property can be set to to indicate that rows should be added, to indicate that columns should be added, or to disallow expansion.

exception.span: 此屬性值對於此列舉型別無效。

span.span: The property value is not valid for the enumeration type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LayoutEngine As LayoutEngine

summary.span: 取得目前資料表配置引擎。

span.span: Gets the current table layout engine.
The currently being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用於兩個內容：The property is typically used in two contexts: - 使用資料表配置容器。A container that uses a table layout. - 資料表配置容器，例如包含儲存格的按鈕內所含的控制項。A control contained within a table layout container, such as a button contained in a cell of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性不會配置資料列或任何支援的記憶體。Setting the property does not allocate the rows or any backing memory. 建立資料列時，就會發生這項配置。This allocation occurs when the rows are created. 設定這個屬性會導致資料表進行另一個配置作業。Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化物件控制項。The following example shows how to initialize a object for a control. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 實作自訂的 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md).
